items.description: Keep your customers in the flow by embedding help articles right on your website. With Beacon, they never have to leave the page to find an answer.

features3.subtitle: Estamos cambiando tu experiencia a la hora de buscar tus medicinas
features3.description: Somos una nueva clase de farmacia que mantiene a los comunidades más saludables, a los doctores más satisfechos, y reduce complicaciones y costos, todo a través de la tecnología aplicada con un toque humano.

items.title: Cercanía
items.description: Siempre a tu lado, brindando el apoyo y la confianza de un buen vecino. Estamos aquí para cuidarte cuando más lo necesitas.

items.title: Ahorro
items.description: Ofrecemos productos de calidad a precios justos, para que cuides tu salud y tu economía con tranquilidad.

items.title: Innovación
items.description: Nos adaptamos a tus necesidades con soluciones modernas y eficaces, para que siempre tengas lo mejor en salud.

items.title: Comunidad
items.description: Tu bienestar es nuestra prioridad. Te escuchamos, entendemos y respondemos con un servicio que realmente se adapta a ti.

faqs.subtitle: Preguntas frequentes
faqs.description: Everything you need to know about the product and billing. Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.

items.title: Is there a free trial available?
items.description: Yes, you can try us for free for 30 days. If you want, we’ll provide you with a free, personalized 30-minute onboarding call to get you up and running as soon as possible.

items.title: Can I change my plan later?
items.description: Of course. Our pricing scales with your company. Chat to our friendly team to find a solution that works for you.

items.title: What is your cancellation policy?
items.description: We understand that things change. You can cancel your plan at any time and we’ll refund you the difference already paid.

items.title: Can other info be added to an invoice?
items.description: Yes, you can try us for free for 30 days. If you want, we’ll provide you with a free, personalized 30-minute onboarding call to get you up and running as soon as possible.

items.title: How does billing work?
items.description: Plans are per workspace, not per account. You can upgrade one workspace, and still have any number of free workspaces.

items.title: How do I change my account email?
items.description: You can change the email address associated with your account by going to untitled.com/account from a laptop or desktop.

subscription.subtitle: Still have questions?
subscription.description: Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.
